If it is electrically conductive, place it in the orange box. If it is electrically nonconductive, place it in the yellow box.
next_step:
Thought: I need to test the electrical conductivity of unknown substance U by creating an open circuit with two probe points. Since wires are unpolarized components with terminal1 and terminal2, I'll connect the battery cathode to terminal1 of the black wire, and the red light bulb cathode to terminal1 of the green wire. This leaves terminal2 of both wires free to serve as probes. When both terminal2 ends touch U simultaneously, it will complete the circuit if U is conductive, lighting the bulb.

Action: connect battery cathode to black wire terminal1
